page.title: 07W. Southampton, Local Pub.
page.content:
{ Mountbatten Public House.
At{Lordshill Shopping Centre}there is a pub called the Mountbatten, so we went along to ask the landlord how it got its name. He told us that the pub was built just after{Lord Mountbattens death. The family gave them permission to name the pub after him. While we were there we asked him the most popular drink for men. This was{lager} and for women,{vodka.}Favourite with the children was{coca-cola.}He told us that he sells about{500 gallons of {lager}a week, that's 4000 pints. The busiest evening for the landlord is Friday, but also lots of people drop in for a drink after they've been shopping. The pub is open from 6pm to 11pm weekdays and from 7pm to 10.30 pm on Sunday.
